Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace District 4
Epps School District No. 1 -- 4.57 Mills - SB - 5 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Epps School District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Epps School District No. 1 of the Parish of West Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District''), levy a special tax of four and fifty-seven hundredths (4.57) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $139,400 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and repairing facilities, for purchase and lease of property, for maintenance, replacement, repair and purchase of equipment and to purchase institutional materials and supplies for Epps High School, said millage to represent a ten hundredths of a mill (.10) increase over the 4.47 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2014 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Epps -- 1/2% S&U - Mayor&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Village of Epps Proposition
(New One-Half of One Percent Sales and Use Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Epps, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the rental, the consumption and the storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Village (an estimated $9,300.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years commencing April 1, 2015 and ending March 31, 2025, with the net proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be dedicated and used for any and all lawful municipal purposes?
